attributes.action: Halt proposals to site a Titan Prison on the Omega site Warrington
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A decision on whether a new ‘super prison’ is to be based in Warrington could be made as early as Christmas. 

It has been revealed that discussions have been taking place between the Government and Warrington Borough Council over plans for the Titan prison to open on the Omega business development site in Warrington. 


The jail would be home to 2,500 inmates and would bring with it all of the issues associated with prisons in the local community.

The impact on our neighbourhood, our kids, our house values and the general community will be devastating. 

Give some thought to the impact of thousands of prison visitors not to mention the prisoners being released on your doorstep.

Support this petition and stop this proposterous proposal.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
